content: crochet this simple t-shaped beachy top with the most basic stitches and comfortable drape all you do is make two panels and sew them together so easy cotton blend yarn is light and breezy in the summer and this sweater will be the one you grab all season long pattern includes sizes xs-3xl womens this is an easy level crochet pattern and is very doable for an enthusiastic beginner and the techniques you will need to know are half_double_crochet chain stitch seaming panels together and slip_stitch
